ygData.subject: Re: Research on bard primary stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would, but since I m not actually *playing* EQ anymore, it makes it very difficult. Good luck, though! Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:34 AM 6/17/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
>So far I have recieved character primary stats from only eight people. This
>is still not enough responses to generate a valid sample. There are over 300
>people subscribed to this list. I'm shooting for at least 30 responses
>before I publish the results. Request that anyone who has not sent me
>their characters stats to please do so. I also need to know what race you
>are. Once I get enough data, I will post the "average" bard stats, both
>combined and by race.

I would, but since I'm not actually *playing* EQ anymore, it makes it very
difficult.

Good luck, though!
Talies the Wanderer
